definition: to take things as they are (idiom)/to leave a situation as it is/to be happy with the status quo
The Strange State of the World Witnessed Over 20 Years, novel by late Qing novelist Wu Jianren 吳趼人|吴趼人[Wu2 Jian3 ren2]
pinyin: Er4 shi2 Nian2 Mu4 du3 zhi1 Guai4 Xian4 zhuang4

sentences.english: He self-reflected and decided to decrease the stress and clean up his diet, looking beyond the status quo.
sentences.chinese: 他能自我反醒並決定減少壓力和調整飲食，改變現狀。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo find out the cause and actualities of pre-hospital care of pedo-burn.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解小兒燒傷的致傷因素和院前急救現狀。

sentences.english: The third part of the study focused on the status of vocational school students bad habits.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分集中考察職校生不良行爲習慣的現狀。

sentences.english: While reluctant to criticize the status quo, the guides often let things slip out in conversation.
sentences.chinese: 導遊不願意批評現狀，但在交談中會不時漏嘴。

sentences.english: Hey, that's the economic reality in sports and sports departments today.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，今天體育界和媒體體育部的經濟現狀就是如此。

sentences.english: The paper briefly describes present state of airborne laser reconnaissance subaquatic targets technology at abroad.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了國外機載激光偵察水下目標技術的發展現狀。

sentences.english: Elaborated in the industrialization production the steamed bun anti-aging engineering research present situation.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了工業化生產中饅頭抗老化技術研究現狀。

sentences.english: In contrast with developed islands, this paper also analyzed the problems exposed in earlier exploitation.
sentences.chinese: 對比已開發無人島現狀，分析開發中凸顯的問題。

sentences.english: The developments and current situation of tantalum-niobium hydrometallurgical extraction are presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了鉭鈮溼法冶金技術的發展概況和現狀。

sentences.english: But that may soon be changing.
sentences.chinese: 但是現狀可能很快會改變。

sentences.english: Then evaluates and considers the actualities of the prerogative of mercy that in our country.
sentences.chinese: 在此基礎上對我國赦免權的現狀進行評價和反思。

sentences.english: In this paper, the status and development of vehicle-mounted medical imaging equipments at home and broad were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了國內外車載醫學影像裝備的發展現狀。

sentences.english: Objective To learn the situation of supervision and management of pulmonary tuberculosis(TB) patients by village doctors and its influential factors.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解村醫生督導管理肺結核病人現狀及影響因素。

sentences.english: The actuality and development of engraving heads for electronic engravers were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了電子雕刻機雕刻頭的研究現狀與發展。

sentences.english: Secondly, this paper has dissected the current situation about management of tourist's development of Zaozhuang.
sentences.chinese: 其次，剖析棗莊旅遊業發展管理的現狀。

sentences.english: Is there anything I can do to improve the situation rather than leave?
sentences.chinese: 除了離家出走，我還可以做些什麼來改變現狀嗎？

definition: immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
